name: Fusion Tech
description: Fusion Technologies is a Meta Business Solutions Partner helping businesses connect, engage, and grow using the official WhatsApp Business API and Meta advertising tools. We provide end-to-end solutions for customer engagement, automation, campaign integration, and conversational commerce. Our expertise spans from API integration to chatbot development and Meta Ads optimization.
focus_areas: WhatsApp Engagement Platform – Solutions for automation, broadcasting, live chat, and customer support.
Meta Ads Integration – Click-to-WhatsApp ad setup, campaign tracking, and lead conversion funnels
CRM/API Integrations & Partner Enablement – Scalable offerings for resellers, technology providers, and marketplaces.
